%%%%%%%%%% SIMULATION PARAMETERS %%%%%%%
Data_File_Name = zeta2_mtdna
GenePop_File_Extension = .gen
Run_Number = 100
Pause = Never
Genepop = True
Migrate = True
Migraine_Settings = True
Nexus_File_Format = Haplotypes_and_Individuals


%%%%%%%%%% MARKERS PARAMETERS %%%%%%%%%
Locus_Number = 1
Mutation_Rate = 0.00005
Mutation_Model = HKY85
MRCA_Sequence = 
Sequence_Size = 500
Transition_Transversion_ratio = 0.9
Equilibrium_Frequencies = 0.2 0.3 0.2 0.3

%%%%%%%%%% VARIOUS COMPUTATION OPTIONS %%%
DiagnosticTables = Iterative_Identity_Probability, Hexp, Fis, Seq_stats, Prob_Id_Matrix, Effective_Dispersal, Iterative_Statistics, Allelic_Variance,

%%%%%%%%%% DEMOGRAPHIC OPTIONS %%%%%%%%
Ploidy = Haploid
Lattice_Boundaries = Absorbing
Total_Range_Dispersal = True
Lattice_SizeX = 100
Lattice_SizeY = 1
Ind_Per_Pop = 100000
Void_Nodes = 1
Sample_SizeX = 10
Sample_SizeY = 1
Min_Sample_CoordinateX = 5
Min_Sample_CoordinateY = 1
Ind_Per_Pop_Sampled = 20
Void_Sample_Node = 10
Dispersal_Distribution = Pareto
Immigration_Control = Simple_1D_Product
Total_Emigration_Rate = 0.01
Dist_max = 100
Pareto_Shape = 2
Continuous_Deme_Size_Variation = Logistic
Logistic_Growth_Rate = 0.3
Continuous_Lattice_Size_Variation = Logistic
Lattice_Logistic_Growth_Rate = 0.3


% 1 DEMOGRAPHIC CHANGE
New_Demographic_Phase_At = 10000
Lattice_SizeX = 10
Ind_Per_Pop = 10000
